diff.author: djazayeri
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE patientnotes_note ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, uuid varchar(38) NOT NULL, patient int(11) NOT NULL, title varchar(100), text varchar(1000) NOT NULL, creator int(11) NOT NULL, date_created datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id), KEY `user_who_created_patient_notes_note` (`creator`), CONSTRAINT patientnotes_note_creator FOREIGN KEY (creator) REFERENCES person (person_id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
